  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SubmissionDatabase getInstance()
      Returns submission database singleton for retrieving, adding, updating and deleting Submission entity
      Returns:
      SubmissionDatabase

    • filter

      public List<Submission> filter(String studentUsername, String courseId, String examId)
      Filter exams in the database based on the parameters provided. If parameters is null or empty string, filtering on associated field is not performed.
      Parameters:
      studentUsername - Student username for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field.
      courseId - Course ID for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field.
      examId - Exam ID for filtering. Perform exact matching on this field.
      Returns:
      List of exams matching the parameters

    • exist

      public boolean exist(long id)
      Check if the provided submission ID exists
      Parameters:
      id - Submission id for checking
      Returns:
      Boolean determining if the submission ID provided exists

    • exist

      public boolean exist(Submission submission)
      Check if the provided submission exists by checking its id
      Parameters:
      submission - Submission for checking
      Returns:
      Boolean determining if the submission provided exists

    • addSubmission

      public void addSubmission(Submission entity) throws Exception
      Validate and add the submission to the database. ID would be auto-changed if identical ID already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - Submission for adding
      Throws:
      Exception - The submission is null, or submission with identical student username, course ID and exam ID exists

    • updateSubmission

      public void updateSubmission(Submission entity) throws Exception
      Validate and update the submission provided
      Parameters:
      entity - Submission for updating
      Throws:
      Exception - The provided submission does not have id matched in the database. Perhaps add the submission instead.

    • deleteSubmission

      public void deleteSubmission(Submission entity) throws Exception
      Delete the provided submission.
      Parameters:
      entity - submission for deleting
      Throws:
      Exception - The provided submission does not exist in the database

    • deleteSubmissions

      public void deleteSubmissions(List<Submission> submissions) throws Exception
      Delete the list of submissions provided.
      Parameters:
      submissions - List of submissions for deleting
      Throws:
      Exception - There exist a submission provided which does not exist in the database.

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll() throws Exception
      Delete all the submission in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception - There exist a submission provided which does not exist in the database.
